EmailTemplate.name: Insurance Policy Changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Insurance Policy for {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} has changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because there was a change in the Insurance policy {!Insurance_Policy__c.Name} for {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}.
If you want to see the waiver record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
